text: Dillard's is a department store chain in the United States. It was started in 1983 by William T. Dillard in Little Rock, Arkansas. The chain grew very quickly and now there are more than 300 stores in 29 states, many of which are in Florida and Texas. ==Other websites== *Dillard's website Category:Companies based in Arkansas Category:American department stores Category:Little Rock, Arkansas Category:Companies listed on the New York Stock Exchange Category:1983 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Arkansas
title: Dillard's
